name: weather-fullstack-app
description: Weather application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start-server" "npm run start-client"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run start-server" "npm run start-client"
scripts.vercel-build: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && cd client && npm run build
